sentence: Please understand that this is abnormal and beyond the guardrails, like so much in our civic discourse at this time.” Dave La Torre, a spokesperson for Corman, told the Philadelphia Inquirer that voters in Pennsylvania “deserve to know that their candidates for governor are transparent and comply with the law.” Seidman reports, “(A) letter Wednesday from Corman campaign lawyer Zachary M. Wallen alleged Mastriano ‘may have committed flagrant and willful violations’ of state law by ‘submitting an obviously deficient and incomplete campaign finance report.’ The Corman campaign also sent the letter to state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, a Democrat who is also running for governor.”
author: Alex Henderson
title: Pennsylvania’s gubernatorial race turns nasty as candidate Corman demands criminal investigation of rival Mastriano

sentence: "The developments didn’t bring much clarity to the crowded race to take on state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the presumptive Democratic nominee.
author: Bob Brigham
title: 'Whiplash-inducing': Trump is 'still sowing chaos' in Pennsylvania GOP politics

sentence: Attorney General Josh Shapiro is the presumptive Democratic nominee for governor.
title: Trump slams McSwain, who’d sought his endorsement for gov

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro was at the Rose Garden ceremony, applauding the president’s restrictions on homemade firearms.
author: Cam Edwards
title: GOA explains what the left gets wrong on "ghost guns"
